NAME: TAIEX Workshop on energy management system certification bodies
AIMASSISTANCE: Assistance to the General Directorate of Accreditation on accreditation of energy management system certification bodies according to ISO 17021-1:2015 and ISO 50001:2011.
LEGISLATIONADMIN:
12.10.20.00 Energy / General principles and programmes / Rational utilisation and conservation of energy 
13.30.05.00 Industrial policy and internal market / Internal market: approximation of laws / General, programmes 
 
Energy, energy use, building audit, energy saving, energy efficiency, harmonisation of standards, product safety, market supervision, EC conformity marking, information transfer 
 
 
•	Directive 2012/27/EU of the European Parliament and of the Council of 25 October 2012 on energy efficiency, amending Directives 2009/125/EC and 2010/30/EU and repealing Directives 2004/8/EC and 2006/32/EC 
•	Regulation (EC) No 765/2008 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 9 July 2008 setting out the requirements for accreditation and market surveillance relating to the marketing of products and repealing Regulation (EEC) No 339/93
TARGETAUDIENCE: Staff and technical assessor of General Directorate of Accreditation, Ministry of Energy and Industry, Center for Energy Saving, Members of DPA Technical Committee, University of Tirana.
COORGANISERLOGISTIC: Ms Ardita Mele General Directorate of Accreditation Director of Accreditation Department Rr' Sami Frasheri", Nr. 33  1001 Tirana Albania  ardita.fuga@dpa.gov.al
